text: Ra uhī ta hō jasalē ākāśaharū ra pr̥thvīlā'ī satyakā sātha banā'ēkō cha, ra juna dina usalē yatimātra bhannē cha ki bha'ihāla ta tyō bha'ihālcha. Usakō kurā sām̐cō ra prabhāvakārī cha ra juna dina sūra (siṅgā) phukincha tyasa dina usaikō rājya hunēcha. Dr̥śya ra adr̥śya kurākō ū jñātā hō ra uhī nai bud'dhi sampanna ra sarvajña cha
